      • getValueBySimpleElementTagname

        public java.lang.String getValueBySimpleElementTagname(java.lang.String tagname)
        Purpose: Gets the text content of the given tagname. The element type should be Simple element. If more than one element is found then the text content of the first element will be returned
        Parameters:
        tagname - the name of the element in XML Document
        Returns:
        the text content of the element. If element is not found then null will be returned

      • getValueByTagname

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getValueByTagname(java.lang.String tagname)
        Purpose: Gets the text content of the element(s) as List of String values
        Parameters:
        tagname - name of the element
        Returns:
        the List of String values found against the element of given tagname

      • getValueByTagnameAsMap

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getValueByTagnameAsMap(java.lang.String tagname)
        Purpose: Gets the text content of the element(s) as List of Map of String values and tag names as keys
        Parameters:
        tagname - is the name of the element
        Returns:
        List of Map objects containing the tag names as keys and text content as values

      • getValueFromXPath

        public java.lang.String getValueFromXPath(java.lang.String nodename,
                                          int index)
                                   throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Purpose: Gets the text content of the node at given index position
        Parameters:
        nodename - is the name of the node in XML Document
        index - the position number
        Returns:
        the value of the node at the given position
        Throws:
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

      • getValueFromXPath

        public java.lang.String getValueFromXPath(java.lang.String nodename,
                                          java.lang.String attrname,
                                          java.lang.String attrvalue)
                                   throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Purpsoe: Gets the value of the node with given attribute name with given attribute value
        Parameters:
        nodename - is the name of the node
        attrname - is the name of the attribute of the given node
        attrvalue - is the value of the attribute of the given attribute
        Returns:
        the text content of the given node with given parameters
        Throws:
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
